translation:
Piratini, March 18, 1838.

Account between José Joaquim da Silva Maia and Domingos José de Almeida

- Amount of what was to be given by order of João José Victorica . 30$720
- Money I gave to the ex-partner of D. Pedro . 4$480
- Money that from his account I gave to José Maria Olave . (101 pesos) 80$800
- Partial total 116$000
- Current exchange 75% 87$000
- Total 203$000
- Settlement
- Amount of the account of the ex-partner of D. Pedro . 52$920
- Amount of what by my order was given to Roberto Bare . 62$820
- Total 115$740
- Remainder 87$260
- Joaquim dos Santos de Faria . pg. 18$920
- C. Gaspar Gomes Dias . 49$200
- Lieutenant Joaquim Máximo Lobato . 12$000
- C. Pedro José de Lima . (20 silver patacones) 33$600
- C. Anacleto José de Matos . (4 silver patacones) 6$720
- C. Vilaça . (4 silver patacones) 6$720
- Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu . 11$160
- Lieutenant-Colonel Silvano José Monteiro de Araújo e Paula . (27 silver patacones) pg. 45$360
- Ensign Bento Joaquim de Chaves . (48 pesos emp.) 67$200
- Lieutenant Leandro José da Costa . (5 silver patacones) 8$400
- Francisco Gonçalves Meireles . (20 silver patacones) 33$600
- José Gomes Ferreira Guimarães Cabeça . (6 silver patacones) 10$080
- Lieutenant Joaquim Francisco Botelho . 5$040
- Lieutenant Tomás da Silva Ramos . (3 patacones) 5$040
- Luís Briano de Matos . 12$800
- Subtotal 413$100
- April 6, Isaías Antônio da Silva . (6 silver patacones) 10$560
- Colonel José Manoel de Leão . 64$rs silver pg. 117$120
- Total 540$780
- Major Mariano Glória . one ounce 28$000
- Grand total 568$780

Account with Mr. José Joaquim da Silva Maia and others.
